key.name: big-icons
key.description: Use 24px symbolic icons instead of 16px. It's an accessibility feature which is off by default because it makes icons blurry.

key.name: auto-zoom
key.description: Whether or not the zoom level should automatically adapt to fit the window.

key.name: disabled-tools
key.description: A list of optional tools' id to disable.

key.name: preview-size
key.description: Size of the bigger dimension of the preview (px).

key.name: replace-alpha
key.summary: What will replace transparent pixels if needed
key.description: What will replace transparent pixels when saving to a format not supporting it, such as JPG or BMP. It can be 'white', 'black', or 'checkboard'.

key.name: background-rgba
key.description: The default color background of a new image.

key.name: default-width
key.description: Default width of a new image (px).

key.name: default-height
key.description: Default height of a new image (px).

key.name: maximized
key.description: The state of the last closed window.

key.name: last-active-tool
key.description: The id of the last active tool, saved when closing a window.

key.name: last-right-rgba
key.description: The last edition color for the right click, saved when closing a window.

key.name: last-left-rgba
key.description: The last edition color for the left click, saved when closing a window.

key.name: last-size
key.description: The last tool size (px), saved when closing a window.

key.name: direct-color-edit
key.description: If a click on the color button should display directly the complete color selector.

key.name: show-labels
key.description: Visibility of tools' labels in the side panel.
